Job Title: Millwright

Location: Blytheville, AR

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Details

 Division: Nucor Yamato Steel 

 Location: Blytheville , AR , United States 

 Other Available Locations: N/A 

Basic Job Functions:

The Millwright will support our Maintenance and Production Teams via Mechanical and some Electrical troubleshooting in a given area of our mill. This includes interpretation of drawings and manuals for the installation, repair, and maintenance of complex equipment systems and machinery such as pumps, valves, cylinders, compressors, conveyors, overhead cranes, etc. The Millwright will use various pieces of equipment, such as forklifts, man lifts, mobile crane, etc. in order to safely operate during routine mechanical operations and/or expectations. The Millwright will also be expected to demonstrate Safety-Minded support of our entire Maintenance Team while seeking to provide World-Class Reliability for our Customers. This position will be expected to work shift rotation to include nights, weekends, overtime, and holidays. Safety is the most important part of all jobs within Nucor; therefore, candidates must be able to demonstrate the ability to initiate, lead, and uphold safety policies, practices, procedures, and housekeeping standards at all times.

Minimum Requirements:

Experience using Engineering and Maintenance Principles

1-year previous Industrial Mechanical Maintenance Experience

Experience interpreting drawings and manuals for complex equipment and machinery

Detailed Selection Criteria:

Initiative - Being proactive with seeking out work that needs to be done and being willing to take on responsibilities and challenges.

Teamwork - Working as part of a coordinated effort with others to achieve a common goal.

Communication - The ability to give full attention to what others are saying and communicate information so that others will understand.

Dependability - Being reliable, responsible, and committed to fulfilling obligations.

Maintenance Systems and Techniques - Extensive mechanical and basic electrical knowledge for assisting with servicing, repairing, adjusting, and testing machines, tools, devices, moving parts, and machines/equipment.

Attention to Detail – Thorough in accomplishing tasks, no matter how small they may be, and taking care to make sure expectations are met.

Problem Solving – Identifying problems, analyzing, and reviewing related information to develop and evaluate options to implement solutions.

Judgment/Decision Making - Considering the relative costs and benefits of potential actions to choose the most appropriate one.

 Nucor is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer – M/F/Disabled/Vets – and a drug – free workplace

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
